Table of Contents

Class MergedFileService

Namespace
MdFilesMerger.App.Concrete
Assembly
MdFilesMerger.App.dll

Service handling list of MergedFile objects associated with the .md files, that will be created as a result of merge, whose absolute paths are stored.

Inheritance: BaseService<T> -> BaseDirectoryService<T> -> MergedFileService
Implements: ICRUDService<T>, IDirectoryService<T>, IEditFileService<T>, IMergedFileService, IService<T> 

public sealed class MergedFileService : BaseDirectoryService<MergedFile>, IMergedFileService, IEditFileService<MergedFile>, IDirectoryService<MergedFile>, ICRUDService<MergedFile>, IService<MergedFile>

Constructors

MergedFileService()

Initializes a new instance of the MergedFileService class and fills list with example data.

public MergedFileService()

Remarks

Creates MergedFile object associated with [MyDocuments]/MergedFiles/README.md file.

Methods

AppendTableOfContents(FileInfo?, int, List<SelectedFile>)

Appends the table of contents at the end of the file.

public void AppendTableOfContents(FileInfo? destinationFile, int mergedFileId, List<SelectedFile> selectedFiles)

Parameters

destinationFile FileInfo

The destination file, where table of contents text will be added.

mergedFileId int

The identifier of the merged file associated with destinationFile.

selectedFiles List<SelectedFile>

The list of all selected files that will be merged into the merged file. It is used to create table of contents.

MergedFile

CreateFile(int)

Creates the file associated with specified MergedFile object.

public FileInfo? CreateFile(int id)

Parameters

id int

The identifier of the object associated with the merged file to create.

Returns

FileInfo

FileInfo of created file or null if no file was specified, or specified file couldn't be created.

Remarks

If the file already exists, it is deleted. New file is created and fill with specified header.

ReadByUserId(int)

Gets, from the stored collection of MergedFile objects, elements with the specified user identifier.

public List<MergedFile> ReadByUserId(int userId)

Parameters

userId int

The searched user identifier.

Returns

List<MergedFile>

The list of MergedFile objects with the specified user identifier. If there is no objects with UserId equal userId, returned list is empty.

UpdateFileName(int, string)

Updates the name of the file associated with specified object.

public int UpdateFileName(int id, string fileName)

Parameters

id int

The identifier of merged file to update.

fileName string

New name of the associated .md file. It doesn't have to include extension.

Returns

int

The identifier of updated object or -1, if there is no MergedFile with specified id in the stored collection or fileName is not a valid file name.

Updates the title.

public int UpdateTitle(int id, string? title)

Parameters

id int

The identifier of object to update.

title string

The new title.

Returns

int

Identification number of updated item, or -1, if update failed (for example there are no item with specified id in the collection).
